sentence: Rooms are very nice facilities shops and variety of restaurants on site were great
The facilities were amazing clean modern and chic
The trainer at the work our facility frankvphysique was the highlight of our trip
Enterprise car rental is near the lobby and they were also very efficient and helpful in getting a car for us to drive to the west coast of Florida
The pool is amazing the people are mostly friendly whether in the elevator or at desk
From the luxury rooms city or water views both incredible to the chic pool side atmosphere to the relaxing Spa treatments fabulous restaurants and exhilarating nightclub and lobby bar
Room was very nice but they put us all the way in the Versailles side where all the corporate room accounts were and it was quite a walk from the lobby spa restaurants and pool area
Nice hotel lobby and spectacular view from the main tower ocean front room
Good venue and facilities
The nice little shops restaurants and the lobby is always full of excitement and fun
I usually go to this hotel every year and I recognize the facilities of the hotel are probably the best in Miami beach basically due to the big Surface of the facilities

Lobby and main areas are beautiful and fun the room needs some updating and check in is too old school no option to electronically check in so we had to wait in a long line and a nasty woman cut the entire line and they allowed that to happen vs setting her aside and putting her at the back of the line
One night was all it took to find other accommodations
The lobby needs a redo
The Fountainbleau is more like 4 separate hotels and we were a long way from the front desk several long hallways stairs elevators
I was then told the only access to my room was via stairs
First thing we see when we get off the elevator on the 5th floor is old worn carpet not a good first impression
I did not hear noise from the rooms next to me or people in the hall
There are concert venues and a nightclubBut the rooms are small and came with no amenities
There were people sleeping in the lobby
